summary: This bill, the 'Delivering Elderly Lunches and Increasing Volunteer Engagement and Reimbursements Act of 2025' or the 'DELIVER Act of 2025,' proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It aims to increase the standard charitable mileage rate for volunteers delivering meals to elderly, disabled, frail, and at-risk individuals. The amendment specifies a higher mileage reimbursement rate for this specific purpose, effective upon the enactment of the Act.
